title: League of Legends game Frozen
body: I just got out of a league of legends game where as soon as champ select was completed and everyone started to load into the game. i never saw everyone loading in. except my computer screen went completely black which turned out to be the game window. i tried to exit out of the game window and possibly reconnect through the client, but that wasn't happening, because i guess the game wanted the confirmation that always happens when you try to alt + f4 out of the game, which i couldn't see. i tried to exit the game and reconnect through various methods including the task manager but the game window took up my whole screen and i couldn't access it. this took about 10 minutes when i decided to restart my computer. this had worked. when i got the game back up again. i looked at my match history and i was classed to have left the game and a remake was issued. which also means that the game window had stayed open even when the match was over. now finally, what happened here and how do we fix it?

replies.body:
1. Make sure your GPU drivers are up to date.
2. Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.
3. Submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
